title: IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2026 - Apply Online for Project Associate Posts
description: Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur (IIT Kanpur)  has released an official notification for the recruitment of various Project Associate Posts. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
